name: OpenConcept Consulting Inc.
tag_list: drupal, open-source, gpl, accessibility, php, mysql, union, non-profit, government, cms, development
description: Open source software for social change
overview:
OpenConcept Consulting is based in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. In business since 1999, we have broad expertise using the Drupal toolkit in developing dynamic, database-driven websites for a wide variety of government programs and agencies, NGOs, trade unions, and socially progressive organizations in Canada and the USA. We also have broad expertise in hosting, supporting, and administering Drupal websites. Our comprehensive website service and support program ensures that our clients can have complete confidence that their websites are operating securely and reliably.

At OpenConcept, we believe strongly in developing a positive, long term relationship with our clients, and we work closely with our clients to meet the needs of their organizations and staff. All members of our team are also active members of our respective communities. We devote a portion of our time and resources toward the environment, education, and social justice. These community values form an important base from which we manage our activities both as individuals and as a team.
